<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Sea Devil Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=358)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Scouts, among the lowliest (and most disposable) of sea devils, ply the inky waters of the ocean in search of aquatic prey, tread ashore to gauge landborne threats, or charge into battle with the advance forces of a greater sea devil war party.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/SeaDevil_SeaDevilScout.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Sea Devil Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=358)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Sea Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=235" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 286</row>

**Perception** +9; darkvision, wavesense 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14); shark commune 150 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Shark Commune** ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [telepathy](/Traits.aspx?ID=250)) The sea devil can communicate telepathically with sharks within range. It can communicate only simple concepts like “come,” “guard,” or “attack.”

**Items**
[Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), [Longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longspear +11 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +11,
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +12 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Blood Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135)) **Requirements** The sea devil is not [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) or already in a frenzy. **Trigger** The sea devil deals bleed damage to a living creature. **Effect** The sea devil flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the sea devil gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with its claws and jaws, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with its claws and jaws, gains 7 temporary HP until the end of the frenzy, and takes a –2 status penalty to AC. The sea devil can’t voluntarily stop its frenzy. After its frenzy, the sea devil is [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15).

**Bloodletting**   When the sea devil deals piercing or slashing damage, it also deals 1d4 persistent bleed damage if the target was [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) or if the attack was a critical hit.

</column>

name: Sea Devil Scout
